
Assemble ../../../as/ptn3_call.casl (0)

Assemble ../../../as/ptn3.casl (0)

Label::::
PTN3 ---> #0005
MAIN ---> #0000

Assemble ../../../as/ptn3_call.casl (1)
../../../as/ptn3_call.casl:1:MAIN    START
../../../as/ptn3_call.casl:2:        LAD     GR1,5
	#0000	#1210
	#0001	#0005
../../../as/ptn3_call.casl:3:        CALL    PTN3
	#0002	#8000
	#0003	#0005
../../../as/ptn3_call.casl:4:        RET
	#0004	#8100
../../../as/ptn3_call.casl:5:        END

Assemble ../../../as/ptn3.casl (1)
../../../as/ptn3.casl:1:PTN3   START
../../../as/ptn3.casl:2:       LD      GR2,=#0001
	#000A	#0001
	#0005	#1020
	#0006	#000A
../../../as/ptn3.casl:3:       SLL     GR2,0,GR1
	#0007	#5221
	#0008	#0000
../../../as/ptn3.casl:4:       RET
	#0009	#8100
../../../as/ptn3.casl:5:       END
